name: Shaggy 2.5 Test
description:
u can now play shaggy

HERE ARE THE CONTROLS:

WASD and Arrow Keys = Singing poses

Space = Stand up (Only for Simulation Shaggy)

1 = Switch to Red Shaggy

2 = Switch to WB Shaggy (Plays cutscene)

3 = Switch to Zephyrus (Possessing WB Shaggy)

4 = Switch to Normal Shaggy

5 = Switch to Kaio-Ken Shaggy

6 = Switch to God Eater Shaggy

E = Next song

T = Make the BG Darker 

Y = Make the BG Normal Brightness

K = Make the BG for Chapter 5 rotate
